content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 40, "index": 41}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a wooden_shovel, I need to place 1 crimson_planks and 2 sticks in the crafting table. I will first move the crimson_planks to the crafting table.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 40, "index": 41}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I need to place 2 sticks in the crafting table. I will move 1 stick to slot 4.
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 40, "index": 41}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now move the other stick to slot 7.
act: move from slot 12 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 20, "index": 21}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 25, "index": 24}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "rose_bush", "quantity": 40, "index": 41}, {"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 19, "index": 42}, {"type": "gray_banner", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}, {"type": "flint", "quantity": 46, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the wooden_shovel by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
